name: tearful-look
effect: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by one stage each.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user gets teary eyed to make the target lose
its combative spirit. This lowers the target’s
Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

its combative spirit. This lowers the target’s
Attack and Sp. Atk stats.
